name: Leezpunk

aura.name: sixth_sense
aura.description: When activated, utilizes its sixth sense to detect nearby dungeons.

description: A Pal that always takes great care to maintain a stylish stance. Always on the hunt for the coolest poses, if given a mirror it will spend all day posing in front of it.

skills.name: poison_blast
skills.description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

skills.name: dark_ball
skills.description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down the enemy.

skills.name: shadow_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: spirit_flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: nightmare_ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: ignis_breath
skills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: dark_laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
